Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Mike Scott (PIT)...
Traded from Chicago to St. Louis on 7/31/1985 (Going to STL: C Jody Davis, 1B Leon Durham. Going to CHC: C Tom Pagnozzi, C Carlton Fisk, CF Brian Harper)...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/15/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1986, hitting .480 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 4/3/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1990 to a minor league contract.
